epics.title: Image Processing
epics.goal: Allow users to upload images and generate Loomis-style breakdowns.

stories.story: As a user, I can upload a photo so the system can process it.
tasks: Backend: Set up FastAPI with upload endpoint
Storage: Save images locally (later S3/Firebase)

stories.story: As a system, I can detect forms (circle, box, line) from the image.
tasks: AI: Implement OpenCV edge detection + contour simplification
Return dummy JSON in Tutorial format

stories.story: As a user, I get feedback if the image cannot be processed.
tasks: Add error handling for invalid image inputs
Show error message in frontend

epics.title: Tutorial Generation
epics.goal: Convert processed image into step-by-step Loomis tutorials.

stories.story: As a user, I receive a sequence of steps to build my drawing.
tasks: Define tutorial step logic (forms → construction → refine)
Implement JSON output for steps/shapes

stories.story: As a user, I can see shapes added step-by-step.
tasks: Generate overlay images for each step

stories.story: As a user, I can view a simple caption alongside each step.
tasks: Add captions for teaching guidance

epics.title: Frontend Experience
epics.goal: Provide a clean and simple UI for artists.

stories.story: As a user, I can drag & drop a photo to upload.
tasks: Set up Next.js frontend
Build upload form with drag & drop

stories.story: As a user, I can view generated tutorial steps.
tasks: Display tutorial JSON in UI (debug mode)
Create step viewer with prev/next navigation

stories.story: As a user, I can switch between light/dark mode.
tasks: Add minimal styling (artist-friendly)
Implement theme toggle

epics.title: Export & Sharing
epics.goal: Let users save and share tutorials.

stories.story: As a user, I can export my tutorial as PNG/PDF.
tasks: Backend: Implement export service (PDF/PNG)
UI: Add 'Export' button

stories.story: As a user, I can share my tutorial with others.
tasks: Save exported files in storage with links
Expose shareable link

epics.title: Future Enhancements
ideas: User accounts + history of past tutorials
